questions: Q. 1. “There is enough for everybody’s need but not for everybody’s greed. “ Who said these words ?
Q. 2. . State any one reason for overuse of resources?  Why ground water is overused?  1 mark each
answers: Ans. Any one reason for the overuse of resources can be : l over population. l lack of awareness. l excessive use of tubewells, canals etc for irrigation. l industrial need.
